markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Chronomancer's Secrets](/Feats.aspx?ID=3841) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 185

**Archetype** [Time Mage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=191)

**Prerequisites**
[Time Mage Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3839)

</column>

---

The secrets of time peel back, revealing deeper truths. You gain either the [_stasis_](/Spells.aspx?ID=623) domain spell or the [_path of least resistance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1194) focus spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your pool by 1.

**Special** You can take this feat a second time, gaining the focus spell that you didn't gain the first time. Increase the number of Focus Points in your pool by 1.
name: Chronomancer's Secrets
